title: New: Sunless ’97 – Aurora I
content:
Since Sunless ’97s emergence with their split single, Body Weather/Azul, in June of last year, the band have retired into relative obscurity.

They’re set to return this month with a new split single, due out on Not Even Music. The a-side, Aurora I, is the first cut released for stream. Increasingly catchy on repeated listens, it’s not the best piece of work the band have put out, but it has a timeless groove that’s difficult not to at least twitch to.

The band will celebrate the record’s release at the Sebright Arms on the 20th of March.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
